Class Battery

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Battery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inspectable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Nameable, Threadable

    public class Battery
extends Item
implements java.lang.Runnable, Threadable
    A battery. Can be used in item's that take a battery
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Battery

        public Battery()
        Constructor. Create a standard Battery.

      • Battery

        public Battery(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description)
        Constructor. Create a Battery with a name and description. Standard charge.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Battery
        description - Description of the Battery

      • Battery

        public Battery(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description,
               float maxCharge)
        Constructor. Create a Battery with a name, description and a maximum charge.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Battery
        description - Description of the Battery
        maxCharge - A maximum charge level. Standard is 100.0f.
